mapper.insert: insert into b_blog(title, content, first_picture, flag, views, appreciation, share_statement, commentabled,published, recommend, create_time, update_time, type_id, tag_ids, user_id, description) values (#{title},#{content},#{firstPicture},#{flag},#{views},#{appreciation}, #{shareStatement},#{commentabled},#{published},#{recommend},#{createTime},#{updateTime}, #{typeId}, #{tagIds}, #{userId}, #{description})
mapper.delete: delete bt from b_blog_tags bt left join b_blog b on b.id = bt.id where bt.blog_id = #{id};
mapper.update: update b_blog set published = #{published},flag = #{flag} , title = #{title}, content = #{content}, type_id = #{typeId}, tag_ids = #{tagIds}, first_picture = #{firstPicture} , description = #{description} , recommend = #{recommend} , share_statement = #{shareStatement}, appreciation = #{appreciation}, commentabled = #{commentabled} ,update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id};
update b_blog set views = #{views} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select b.id, b.published, b.flag, b.title, b.content, b.type_id, b.tag_ids, b.first_picture, b.description, b.recommend, b.share_statement, b.appreciation, b.commentabled, b.views from b_blog b where b.id = #{id};
select b.id, b.title, b.recommend, b.published, b.update_time, t.id typeid, t.name typename from b_blog b, b_type t where b.type_id = t.id

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, b.tag_ids, t.name typename, t.id typeid, u.nickname, u.avatar from b_blog b, b_type t, b_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and b.type_id = #{typeId} order by b.update_time desc

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, b.tag_ids, t.name typename, t.id typeid, t1.name tagname, t1.id tagid, u.nickname, u.avatar from b_blog b, b_type t, b_user u, b_blog_tags bt, b_tag t1 where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and bt.blog_id = b.id and bt.tag_id = t1.id and t1.id = #{tagId} order by b.update_time desc

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, b.tag_ids, t.name typename, t.id typeid, u.nickname, u.avatar from b_blog b, b_type t, b_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id order by b.update_time desc
select id, title, recommend from b_blog order by update_time desc;

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, b.tag_ids, t.name typename, u.nickname, u.avatar from b_blog b, b_type t, b_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and (b.title like #{pattern} or b.content like #{pattern}) order by b.update_time desc

select b.id, b.first_picture, b.flag, b.title, b.content, b.views, b.update_time,b.commentabled, b.share_statement, b.appreciation, u.nickname, u.avatar, b.type_id, b.user_id, b.create_time, tag.id tagid, tag.name tagname from b_blog b, b_user u, b_tag tag, b_blog_tags tb where b.user_id = u.id and tb.blog_id = b.id and tb.tag_id = tag.id and b.id = #{id}
select DATE_FORMAT(b.update_time, '%Y') from b_blog b order by b.update_time desc
